author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Intrum Justitia confirms dialogue with italian Bank Intesa Sanpaolo regarding acquisition â€‹
text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Intrum Justitia Ab says:
* Can confirm an ongoing dialogue with the Italian bank Intesa Sanpaolo regarding an acquisition of a servicing platform and a portfolio of non-performing loans (NPLs)
* These discussions are at an early stage and no further details will be disclosed. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting By Johan Sennero)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
